definition: to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

sentences.english: By the rivers of Babylon we sat and wept when we remembered Zion .
sentences.chinese: 他们曾在巴比伦的河边坐下，一追想锡安就哭了。

sentences.english: The scene awakened reminiscence of my youth.
sentences.chinese: 这景象唤起了我对青年时代许多往事的追想。

sentences.english: I thought about the former days, the years of long ago;
sentences.chinese: 我追想古时之日，上古之年。

sentences.english: By the rivers of Babylon we sat and wept when we remembered Zion.
sentences.chinese: 我们曾在巴比伦的河边坐下，一追想锡安就哭了。

sentences.english: In the days of her affliction and wandering Jerusalem remembers all the treasures that were hers in days of old.
sentences.chinese: 耶路撒冷在困苦窘迫之时，就追想古时一切的乐境。

sentences.english: By the rivers of Babylon, there we sat down, yea, we wept, when we remembered Zion.
sentences.chinese: 我们曾在巴比伦的河边坐下，一追想锡安就哭了。

definition: variant of 紀念|纪念[ji4 nian4]
to recall/to bring to mind/to reminisce
to look far ahead/to look forward (to)
to recall with emotion/to feel sentiments
the past/impurity contracted previously (in the sentient world) (Buddhism)
to recollect/to recall (past times)/to look back
to visit a place for the memories/to pay homage to (the deceased)
